summary: Just a small retexture of the wonderful \"Northman Knight Helm\" from \"Northman Armours - Credo StandAloneMod\".
descriptionHtml:
*** NEW UPDATE *** (25/12/2012)

Better version with improved normal map and higher resolution.


*** DESCRIPTION ***

I just felt the deep need to adapt the helm to my own taste, getting something similar to the famous \"Valsgärde helm\".


*** INSTALLATION *** :

*** THAT\'S NOT A STANDALONE VERSION OF THE HELM ***

YOU\'LL NEED TO PREVIOUSLY INSTALL : 

 [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26321]Northman Armours - Credo StandAloneMod[/URL]

Just copy the content of the archive into your SKYRIM DATA folder and enjoy your Viking experience ! :D

**** PERMISSIONS ***

You can use these new textures as you wish but please, remember to give me credits for the use. 

Furthermore, don\'t forget to credit :

DEJAWOLF, as the original creator of the texture.

ACTUSREUS, as the person whom ported it to Skyrim.

*** CREDITS ***

A special thanks to :

DEJAWOLF, for the original helm mesh and texture.

ActusReus, a very great modder and person :D, author of the superlative \"Northman Armours - Credo StandAloneMod\"

Croc, creator of the best Viking chainmail mod for Skyrim currently in circulation : \"NorseViking Chainmail\" for providing helm\'s chainmail texture.


*** SUGGESTED MODS ***

This mod was designed to be mounted with

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27132][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/logo2.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092][IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12092-1-1335454819.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13462]\"NorseViking Chainmail”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ac7b3e][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4793]\"CONAN THE BARBARIAN outfits”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26321][IMG]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/NorthmanArmours.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]
